CuratorAdmin_RSSFeed_desc: Setting up RSS feeds allows you to automate the Steam Events and Announcement creation from your existing content management platform. Your content from your site will automatically surface to Steam customers who follow you as News.
CuratorAdmin_Curator_lang_only: NOTE: The curator is set to %1$s language which is different from the feed language of %2$s.  Re-save the feed to update to this language.
CuratorAdmin_RSSFeed_lang: The language is set on the group to '%1$s'. If this is not correct, you can edit the group profile and then re-setup this feed.
CuratorAdmin_RSSFeed_english_desc: Enter the URL to your English RSS feed. At this time we are limited to English only, however, we will soon open up other language support.
CuratorAdmin_RSSFeed_hint: Enter a URL to your RSS feed. This usually renders as XML in your browser
SteamCurator_Hidden: There is one hidden item due to your store content preferences.

RSSFeed_PostError_NoTimeOrInvalidFormat: News Post is missing a date.
RSSFeed_PostError_TimeOutOfRange: News Post date is out of range. It is either in the future which is not support or the date earlier than Sep 12, 2003.
RSSFeed_PostError_TitleMissing: News Posts require a title. This is missing or empty.
RSSFeed_PostError_DescriptionMissing: News Posts require a description or contents - which is either empty or misisng. This becomes the body of the evnet post. This is required
RSSFeed_PostError_URLMissingOrInvalid: News Posts require a URL to the original article. This is required.
Events_FailedToFind: Error: Event does not exist. Return to %1$s

EventModeration_ShowCustomFilter_ttip: The default (non-custom) results are exactly the events that require moderation.  The include event not yet moderated or those that require re-moderation as the partner has since updated the event.
EventModTile_ChangeEventType_Desc: The current event category is %1$s. By selecting below and hitting OK, it will immediately change the event's category to the specified type below:
PointShop_Event_Over: The event is over but you can still get these items
HeaderBody1: Explore personalized recommendations from our machine learning system, based on your Steam gameplay history as compared to millions of other players'. Customize your results using the sliders and filters, then save your settings so Steam remembers what you're looking for.
NoRecommendationsDueToFilter: All of your recommendations have been excluded by filters (including store-wide preferences you have set). Try relaxing your filter settings.

SupportStats_Header_Desc: Our on-going goal with Steam is to improve the experience of our users in all areas, including customer support.  We believe that by sharing this data, we'll be able to spot problems earlier, identify areas for improvement, and to ultimately create better customer support experiences.  <1>Read more about why we created this page on our Steam blog.</1>
NotificationSettings_Desc1: Steam will display a summary of notifications on startup, then reduce the frequency to only notify you when necessary.
NotificationSettings_Desc2: Note: Turning off a notification type also means it will not show up in the green bell at the top of the Steam Client.
CookiePref_TechnicallyNeccesary_Desc: The following cookies are always set when you use the Steam websites
CookiePref_SessionID_Desc: Protects our users and services against certain attacks (so-called cross-site request forgery / CSRF attacks).
CookiePref_ShoppingCart_Desc: Set only if you’ve added items to your shopping cart on the Steam store while not logged in.
CookiePref_SteamCountry_Desc: Cached result of doing an iploc lookup on your public ip address. This is used to comply with regional legal and taxation requirements.
CookiePref_Timezone_Desc: Your system timezone setting, which is set in a cookie so that the server can display times appropriately.
CookiePref_BirthTime_Desc: This is only set if you fill out an age gate and is used to limit access to potentially inappropriate content.
CookiePref_CookieSettings_Desc: This stores the settings you make on this page or on the cookie warning banner.
CookiePref_Login_Desc: These are used to support secure login to Steam.
CookiePref_Language_Desc: We cache your preferred language so it will be used the next time you visit Steam.
CookiePref_Content_Desc: To customize the editorial content on Steam based on your use of services
CookiePref_Content_ToggleDesc: Game pages you've visited (sometimes displays in the store footer in place of recommendations)
CookiePref_ValveAnalytics_Desc: To measure the audience on Steam and improve services
CookiePref_ValveAnalytics_ToggleDesc: Our own internal analytics that we use to determine traffic to a specific store page and reported anonymously. App_impressions lasts only for one page view.
CookiePref_ThirdParty_Desc: These are necessary to embed certain external media in our websites
CookiePref_YouTube_Desc: Cookies placed by embedded YouTube players within Steam.  Subject to %1$s
CookiePref_Vimeo_Desc: Cookies placed by embedded Vimeo players within Steam. Subject to %1$s
CookiePref_Sketchfab_Desc: Cookies placed by embedded Sketchfab players within Steam.  Subject to %1$s
CookiePref_ErrorNotSaved: Your preferences have not been saved. Please try again later.
NotificationPref_ErrorNotSaved: Your preferences have not been saved. The Steam servers are busy. Please try again later.
PrivacySettings_Marketing_Desc: Some game developers add additional information to their Steam Store page web links using a format called UTM.  The UTM information is used to measure the effectiveness of web sites, customer communications and marketing campaigns. Steam summarizes and anonymizes the data to protect user privacy, then provides the developer with a report on how these UTM links performed.
PrivacySettings_UTM_ToggleDesc: Include how my UTM visits performed in the summarized, anonymized reports provided to game developers

authorized_devices_deauthorize_msg: This will log you out of Steam everywhere, including this session. You will need to reauthorize each device, computer, and browser you wish to use.

accountpreferences_account_security_desc: Steam Guard helps protect the value in your account from unauthorized access. You'll be asked to verify your sign in with the Steam Mobile App. <1>Steam Guard FAQ</1>
accountpreferences_account_security_back: Backup codes are single-use Steam Guard codes just for your account.

accountpreferences_account_security_apk_: Android users without access to Google Play can <1>download the latest version here</1>.

OpenInDesktopAppBanner_Body: Open this page in the Steam App to wishlist, follow, purchase and see recommendations
FamilyManagement_CreateInstructions: Steam Families allow you to share your Steam games with up to 5 other household members, and manage parental controls for children in the family.
FamilyManagement_CreateInstructions_2: Family members can join a Steam Family as either an Adult or a Child. Adult members have family management permissions and can set parental controls for Child members. Parental controls include playtime limits, restricting access to specific Steam features, and limiting access to specific games.
FamilyManagement_CreateInstructions_3: Adults can administer the accounts of child members, including limiting their playtime, their access to features of Steam like Store and Community, and restricting the games they can access from other family members.
FamilyManagement_CooldownNotice: You can create or join a new Steam Family on %1$s.
FamilyManagement_CanRejoin: You can rejoin your last Steam Family if invited.
FamilyManagement_CanUndelete: You can restore the last Steam Family you were part of:
FamilyManagement_CooldownAllowed: Normally, your account would be prevented from joining or creating a Steam Family until %1$s.
FamilyManagement_CooldownAllowed_2_Creat: As a customer service gesture we are waiving this restriction, and you are able to create a Steam Family at this time.
FamilyManagement_CooldownAllowed_2_Join: As a customer service gesture we are waiving this restriction, and you are able to join a Steam Family at this time.
FamilyManagement_CreateAFamilyText: Enter a name below to create a Family. This name is only visible to current and invited members, and can be changed at any time. Once your Steam Family is created, you will be able to invite household members to the family.
FamilyManagement_PendingInvitesText: You have been invited to join an existing family. <1>WARNING:</1> Do not join a Steam Family unless you know and trust the people involved. Steam Families are meant for close households; <2>once you accept an invite, you cannot join a different Steam Family for one year.</2>
FamilyManagement_ToJoinInstructions: To join an existing Steam Family, an adult member that you are friends with on Steam must invite you.
FamilyManagement_RoleDescriptionShort_Ad: As an <1>Adult</1> member of a Steam Family, you can manage members and set parental controls for children. <2>Learn more</2>
FamilyManagement_RoleDescriptionShort_Ch: As a <1>Child</1> your account is managed by adults in your Steam Family. <2>Learn more</2>
Adults can restrict your access to games and Steam features
You cannot leave the family unless an Adult removes you
FamilyManagement_AdultDescription_1: Adults in Steam families control who is in the family and what children in the family can do. Adults can invite new members, remove existing members, and leave the family themselves. They can play any game from the family library.
FamilyManagement_AdultDescription_2: Adults can control the following features of child accounts:
FamilyManagement_AdultDescription_3: Restrict the child's access to the Steam store and community.
FamilyManagement_AdultDescription_4: Limit the games that a child can play.
FamilyManagement_AdultDescription_5: Limit the amount of time and when during the day a child can play.
FamilyManagement_ChildDescription_1: Children in families can play games from the family library, but are otherwise very limited in what they can do. They cannot leave the family unless an adult in the family removes them, they cannot invite new members, and they cannot see anything about the family except its current members. They are subject to controls from the adult members. In particular, adults in the family can:
FamilyManagement_ChildDescription_2: Restrict the child's access to the Steam store and community.
FamilyManagement_ChildDescription_3: Limit the games that a child can play.
FamilyManagement_ChildDescription_4: Limit the amount of time and when during the day a child can play.
FamilyManagement_ChildDescription_5: Do not join a family as a child unless you are invited by a trusted parent or guardian.
FamilyManagement_DeleteFamilyVerbiage: Deleting your Steam Family will remove all members from the family and disable parental controls on all children in the family. After you delete this Steam Family you will not be able to create or join another Steam Family until %1$s.
FamilyManagement_CannotJoinWhileAlreadyM: Oops! You tried to accept an invitation to a Steam Family, but this account is already a member of a family. Please log in to the account that received the invitation.

Steamawards_NominateNow: NOMINATE YOUR CHOICES - NOW UNTIL DEC 1st @ 10AM Pacific.
Steamawards_LevelUpNow: LEVEL UP YOUR %1$s NOMINATION COMMITTEE BADGE.
Steamawards_VoteWinter: VOTE FROM THE FINALISTS DURING THE WINTER SALE.
Steamawards_MakeYourOwnNominations_Btn: Click here to enter your own nominations
Steamawards_Task1: Nominate a game in at least one category
Steamawards_Task2: Nominate a game in each category
Steamawards_Task3: Review (or update your review) for a game you've nominated
Steamawards_FAQ_XP_Q: Does the badge earn me XP?
Steamawards_FAQ_XP_A: Yes, each level of the badge gives an additional 25XP.
Steamawards_FAQ_BadgesAll_Q: Where can I see all my badges?
Steamawards_FAQ_BadgesAll_A_wLink: You can see all your completed and in progress badges from %1$s.
Steamawards_FAQ_ReviewsPrev_A: You’ll need to post a new review (for a game you’ve nominated) or update a review you previously posted. Make sure to nominate the game first. Use the review to tell other players why you think that game should win.
Steamawards_FAQ_BadgeSkipping_Q: Does skipping a category count towards the badge?
Steamawards_FAQ_BadgeSkipping_A1: You can skip any category where you don't feel that you have enough data to confidently nominate any game. As long as you specifically click the button to skip a category, it will count toward your badge.
Steamawards_FAQ_BadgeSkipping_A2: To skip a category, scroll up this page to the desired category and click “Select Nominee”. You will see some nomination options as well as a “Skip” button near the bottom.
Steamawards_FAQ_WhoCanNominate_Q: Who can nominate a game for the Steam Awards?
Steamawards_FAQ_WhoCanNominate_A: To prevent nomination abuse and botting, any non-limited Steam account can nominate and vote in the Steam Awards.
Steamawards_FAQ_HowToNominate_Q: How do I set my nominations?
Steamawards_FAQ_HowToNominate_A: You can nominate games by scrolling up this page to the desired category and clicking “Select Nominee”. You will see a few suggestions for games you've played, recommended games, or the option to simply search for a game.
Steamawards_FAQ_WhichGames_A1: The eligibility for the Labor of Love category works a little different from all the other categories.
Steamawards_FAQ_WhichGames_A2: The Labor of Love category is intended for games that have been around long enough to have been shown lots of development love - at least a year or so. So all games that released prior to last year's autumn sale are eligible for nomination with the exception of previous year's winners (Warframe, GTA V, CS2, Terraria, Cyberpunk 2077, Red Dead Redemption 2 and Elden Ring).
Steamawards_FAQ_WhichGames_A3: For every category except Labor of Love, only games that released on Steam after the previous year's Autumn Sale will be eligible for nominations.
Steamawards_FAQ_NominateMultiple_Q: Can I nominate the same game for multiple categories?
Steamawards_FAQ_NominateMultiple_A: Yes, you can nominate a single game for as many categories as you think are appropriate.
Steamawards_FAQ_EditNominations_A: Yes, click the “Edit” button above your current choice to change your nomination.
Steamawards_FAQ_HowShareFriends_Q: How do I share my nominees with my friends?
Steamawards_FAQ_HowShareFriends_A: To share your nominees, click on the “Generate new link” button right below the Steam Award categories on this page. You'll be able to create a link to share your nominations page with your friends even if you haven't finished nominating for all categories. Generating a new link will invalidate any prior links.
Steamawards_FAQ_WinnersSelected_Q: When are the winners selected and announced?
Steamawards_FAQ_WinnersSelected_A: The five finalists in each category will be available to vote on during the Steam Winter Sale this December. Voting will be open until January 3rd @ 10AM PST, at which point we'll immediately announce the winners.
Steamawards_Badge_BadgeDesc: Nominate a game in at least one category to earn level one of the badge. Then, complete additional tasks to level it up.
Steamawards_Nominate_ThisYear: Select a game that released this year
Steamawards_Nominate_PastYear: Select a game that released more than a year ago
Steamawards_Nominate_Search: Search for a specific eligible game...
Steamawards_Nominate_NoEligibleGames: You haven’t played any eligible games this year
Steamawards_Nominate_NoEligibleGames_con: But that's okay; you can skip this category or check out suggested games below.
Steamawards_Nominate_CheckSuggested: Or, check out suggested games below
Steamawards_ShareLink_Placeholder: Click button below to generate unique link to share
Steamawards_Nominate_Error_NoMatch: The game (%1$s) isn't eligible for this category. If you think this is incorrect please contact Steam Support.
Steamawards_Nominate_Error_Generic: We encountered an error while nominating this game (%1$s). Please try again later. (%2$s)
Steamawards_ShareModal_Description: Click below to generate a unique, sharable link. Only users that are signed in to Steam and have this link can see your nominations.
Steamawards_ShareModal_Description2: If you wish to invalidate a link and create a new one, simply click to re-generate. Note that anyone with the previous URL will no longer be able to access your nominations.
Steamawards_TotalNominations: You've nominated games in %1$s of %2$s categories!
Steamawards_Search_NoResults: No eligible games match your search term
Steamawards_Voting_Header_Winners: The community has spoken! Your votes throughout the Steam Winter Sale have chosen these games below as winners of the %1$s Steam Awards!
Steamawards_Voting_Header_Finalists: You've chosen the nominees - now we need your help in choosing the winners!
Steamawards_Voting_Header_Dates: Winners announced here when voting ends.
Steamawards_Voting_Header_Dates_New: Winners announced here when voting ends.
Steamawards_Progress_Title_Past: You've unlocked these chat stickers by voting in %1$s of %2$s categories during the Winter Sale.
Steamawards_Progress_Title: You've unlocked these chat stickers by voting in %1$s of %2$s categories.
Steamawards_Progress_Title_Soon: Unlock special chat stickers for each of the %1$s categories you vote in.
Steamawards_Progress_Title_None: Unlock special stickers by voting on each of the %1$s categories below.
Steamawards_Progress_Title_LoggedOut: Sign in and earn a sticker for voting in each category.
Steamawards_Voting_Finalists: Cast your vote for one of these finalists during the Winter Sale:
Steamawards_Voting_FAQ_1_A: Any <1>non-limited Steam account</1> can vote in the Steam Awards.
Steamawards_Voting_FAQ_2_Q: Do I get anything for voting?
Steamawards_Voting_FAQ_2_A: Yes, in addition to the warm fuzzy feeling you get from helping shine a light on some of the amazing games of the year, each category you vote on will also grant you a special Steam Awards sticker.
Steamawards_Voting_FAQ_3_Q: How long do I have to vote for each category?
Steamawards_Voting_FAQ_3_A: Voting is open for all categories starting December 21st @ 10am Pacific, and will be available until January 2nd @ 10am Pacific.
Steamawards_Voting_FAQ_3_A_New: Voting is open for all categories starting %1$s, and will be available until %2$s.
Steamawards_Voting_FAQ_4_Q: When will the winners be announced?
Steamawards_Voting_FAQ_4_A: All winners will be announced here on January 2nd at 10am Pacific.
Steamawards_Voting_FAQ_4_A_New: All winners will be announced here on %1$s.
Steamawards_Voting_FAQ_5_Q: What do the winning games get?
Steamawards_Voting_FAQ_5_A: A beautiful physical Steam Awards trophy shipped to the developers' offices and a virtual trophy on the game's store page. Not only that, but we all shall forever remember the game as winner of The Steam Awards!
Steamawards_Voting_FAQ_6_A: The finalists were chosen by your nominations! Games can only be eligible for a maximum of two categories: Game Of The Year (or VR Game Of The Year) and one other category.
Steamawards_Voting_FAQ_6_A_2024: The finalists were chosen by your nominations! Games are eligible across each of the platform categories (Game Of The Year, VR Game Of The Year, and Best Game on Deck) as well as two non-platform categories.
Steamawards_Voting_FAQ_7_Q: How many times can I vote?
Steamawards_Voting_FAQ_7_A: You can cast a vote for each of the eleven categories.
Steamawards_Voting_FAQ_8_A: Yes, you can change your vote up until voting ends.
CreatorHome_SocialMedia_Desc: Optionally provide links to your Creator Home specific social media.

PlaytestInvites_Desc1: This page shows invites you have received to participate in a Steam Playtest. Playtests are used to help test games that are still in development. By accepting, the game will automatically be added to your library.
PlaytestInvites_Desc2: Please refer to information from the developer regarding the nature of the individual playtest. Steam Playtest access does not guarantee full access to the game upon release.
